articles.title: Deutsche Bank to cut 800 jobs after strong first quarter - Reuters
articles.description: Deutsche Bank (DBKGn.DE) is to cut 800 jobs in a new cost-saving drive after reporting a bigger than expected rise in profit for the first quarter, a volatile period globally for finance…
articles.content: FRANKFURT, April 27 (Reuters) - Deutsche Bank (DBKGn.DE) is to cut 800 jobs in a new cost-saving drive after reporting a bigger than expected rise in profit for the first quarter, a volatile period g… [+3598 chars]
